devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance with a cliff period. Optionally revocable by the owner.

constructor.details: Creates a cliff contract that locks its balance of any ERC20 token and only allows release to the beneficiary once the cliff has passed.

params._beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params._cliffInMonths: duration in months of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest

vestedAmount().details: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

devdoc.title: Cliff
